name: Universal SQL converter
short_description:
Convert your SQL data files to and from MySQL, SQLite, PostgreSQL, MSSQL, etc.
Also AXMLS and SQL/XML supported; this tool parses SQL files into a PHP object tree which can easily output SQL into a different format and/or for a different DBMS
